title: Constructions under Seed  Certification and Plant Construction Centre by Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB)
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Mahinda Yapa Abeywardhana, Minister of Agriculture, for the construction of Regional offices and Seed testing laboratories, with particular reference to the Northern and Eastern Provinces, to further strengthen the seed certification process to develop the agricultural activities in the areas, was approved by the Cabinet.
